description.lang: The Da Vinci wall controller is a Multi Chanel Z-Wave device that contains up to 6 relays and up to 9 touch buttons that can be set to control either the relays or any other on/off (SWITCH_BINARY) Z-Wave device.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline
Sends a SWITCH_BINARY_SET command to all group members
Sends a SWITCH_BINARY_REPORT command to all group members
